divs: Sighting Detailswell that night i was sleeping in my room but i couldnt really get to sleep that night and my blinds were open and i couldnt tell if it was the moon or something else because it was so bright and it looked like it was hovering so close and i didn't believe my own eyes(But then again i thought it was because it was 12:00 at night and was tired) 1.I was at my house, and trying to fall a sleep. 2.What i thought was the moon because of how bright and of how close it was to my house. 3. The Moon 4. It just was like hovering for a good amount of time 5. I was like no way that can be the moon because of how close it was 6. I feel asleep
